mapper.select: select count(*) from AL_ALCOHOLLABLE t where 1=1
select AlAlcohollable.* from AL_ALCOHOLLABLE AlAlcohollable where AlAlcohollable.ID = #{id}
mapper.update: update AL_ALCOHOLLABLE set TEMP4=#{temp4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TEMP3=#{temp3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TEMP2=#{temp2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TEMP1=#{temp1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATOR=#{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APPLICANID=#{applicanid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APPLICANT=#{applicant,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BOXLABLE=#{boxlable,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ALTYPE=#{altype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCTID=#{productid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SALES=#{sales,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS=#{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LASTUPDATETIME=#{lastupdatetime,jdbcType=DATE}, GRANT_=#{grant,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TYPE_=#{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VERFYCODE=#{verfycode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SERIAL=#{serial,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OWNER=#{owner,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID=#{id}
mapper.delete: delete from AL_ALCOHOLLABLE where ID in #{ids}

delete from AL_ALCOHOLLABLE where and TEMP4 = #{temp4}and TEMP3 = #{temp3}and TEMP2 = #{temp2}and TEMP1 = #{temp1}and CREATOR = #{creator}and APPLICANID = #{applicanid}and APPLICANT = #{applicant}and BOXLABLE = #{boxlable}and ALTYPE = #{altype}and PRODUCTID = #{productid}and SALES = #{sales}and STATUS = #{status}and LASTUPDATETIME = #{lastupdatetime}and GRANT_ = #{grant}and TYPE_ = #{type}and VERFYCODE = #{verfycode}and SERIAL = #{serial}and OWNER = #{owner}
mapper.select: select AlAlcohollable.* from AL_ALCOHOLLABLE AlAlcohollable where 1=1 and ID=#{id} and TEMP4 = #{temp4} and TEMP3 = #{temp3} and TEMP2 = #{temp2} and TEMP1 = #{temp1} and CREATOR = #{creator} and APPLICANID = #{applicanid} and APPLICANT = #{applicant} and BOXLABLE = #{boxlable} and ALTYPE = #{altype} and PRODUCTID = #{productid} and SALES = #{sales} and STATUS = #{status} and LASTUPDATETIME = #{lastupdatetime} and GRANT_ = #{grant} and TYPE_ = #{type} and VERFYCODE = #{verfycode} and SERIAL = #{serial} and OWNER = #{owner}

select AlAlcohollable.* from AL_ALCOHOLLABLE AlAlcohollable where 1=1 and ID=#{id} and TEMP4 = #{param.temp4} and TEMP3 = #{param.temp3} and TEMP2 = #{param.temp2} and TEMP1 = #{param.temp1} and CREATOR = #{param.creator} and APPLICANID = #{param.applicanid} and APPLICANT = #{param.applicant} and BOXLABLE = #{param.boxlable} and ALTYPE = #{param.altype} and PRODUCTID = #{param.productid} and SALES = #{param.sales} and STATUS = #{param.status} and LASTUPDATETIME = #{param.lastupdatetime} and GRANT_ = #{param.grant} and TYPE_ = #{param.type} and VERFYCODE = #{param.verfycode} and SERIAL = #{param.serial} and OWNER = #{param.owner}

select AlAlcohollable.* from AL_ALCOHOLLABLE AlAlcohollable where 1=1 and TEMP4 like #{param.temp4} and TEMP3 like #{param.temp3} and TEMP2 like #{param.temp2} and TEMP1 like #{param.temp1} and CREATOR like #{param.creator} and APPLICANID like #{param.applicanid} and APPLICANT like #{param.applicant} and BOXLABLE like #{param.boxlable} and ALTYPE like #{param.altype} and PRODUCTID like #{param.productid} and SALES like #{param.sales} and STATUS like #{param.status} and LASTUPDATETIME like #{param.lastupdatetime} and GRANT_ like #{param.grant} and TYPE_ like #{param.type} and VERFYCODE like #{param.verfycode} and SERIAL like #{param.serial} and OWNER like #{param.owner}
